title: The Right Hand of the Devil (1963 Noir Crime) A Heist So Evil, It's Almost Unholy! 4K

sources.title: The Right Hand of the Devil (1963 Noir Crime) A Heist So Evil, It's Almost Unholy! 4K
sources.description:
A sleazy but ingenious criminal mastermind Pepe Lusara (Aram Katcher) assembles a ragtag crew for a high-stakes arena heist, but when Miss Sutherland (Lisa McDonald) gets wise to his game, the getaway turns into a wild cat-and-mouse chase through Los Angeles's underbelly. As double-crosses stack up, he plans some brutal ruses to elude the law, but he's his own worst enemy.

Alternative title: A 117 colpo grosso a Los Angeles / A Big Heist in Los Angeles (1963)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/DY4n4HjCBbw


Director: Aram Katcher
Writers: Ralph Brooke, Aram Katcher
Stars: Aram Katcher, Lisa McDonald, Brad Trumbull

Check out the descriptive audio commentary

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
